message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $150 for it.
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $165.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $155 for the product.
I'm willing to make another adjustment, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $160.
I'm getting closer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $152 for the product.
I'm willing to make one more adjustment, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $158.
I'm really close, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to pay $153 for the product.
I'm willing to make one last adjustment, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $157.
I've reached my limit, Alice. I'm willing to pay $154 for the product.
